short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save all tabs in a browsing window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doing a research and have multiple tabs open that you don't necessarily want to bookmark? We've all been there. 
Session Saver allows you to save all the tabs of a open window. From a Session Saver you can create a new window with all the tabs restored.
